content: That's great to hear! I'm sure that your customers will appreciate the delicious and unique flavors of Benoit Landron's 'Naturlich' made with Semillon. It's always exciting to try a new variation on a classic wine, and the addition of fleshy stone-fruit notes from the Semillon sounds like a perfect fit for springtime. I hope your customers enjoy it and have a lovely time at your natural wine bar!
